title: @Riot Are we getting a timeline soon?
body:
Because right now, that's what we're missing.

Obviously, with the map just released, it's not expected immediately. However, a lot of backstory uses vague terms like "decades" and "centuries" to describe events without ever giving a definitive number.

In some cases, a war or champion biography takes place long ago and is described in such a way to appear mythical, but world-changing events like the Watchers' defeat or Xerath's ascension are probably big enough to have an official date. The old lore, for instance, had events have their dates.

So, are we getting it any time soon?

replies.body:
Are you... Are you asking for a timeline... _for_ a timeline...?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
When Ryze tells Kegan about Shurima he already calls it a fallen empire. If the thing in the sarcophagus existed before Shurima's fall, how could it be Brand?
It could be Brand, just not Kegan Rodhe, right? A World Rune turned Kegan into Brand, so I imagine before Kegan came in contact with it, someone else may have as well.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=0004000000000001,timestamp=2018-07-31T04:07:35.286+0000)
>
> It could be Brand, just not Kegan Rodhe, right? A World Rune turned Kegan into Brand, so I imagine before Kegan came in contact with it, someone else may have as well.

Possibly, otherwise I dont see a clear reason why Nasus, Renekton, and Xerath are still listed in the relation box on his universe page.

Exactly. 

I asked this question to Scathlocke because times were off. And he said "we really need a timeline".

It is mostly a reference and did not expected most to understand it anyway.
Maybe not a timeline with timestamps but more just like, what happened in what order kind of deal.

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-07-30T14:54:15.040+0000)
>
> Are you... Are you asking for a timeline... _for_ a timeline...?
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Hey hey HEY.

Some of us are at work and can't drink currently. Save this mindbending nonsense for when we're all off the job!

>

> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Yes.

Here is your timeline

                        past                                      present                                future
<----------------rune war and shit----------------|---things happen---|---------noxus invade ionia again------>

you're welcome
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
I mean, we have a rough idea of what happened when, but no numbers. I hope we get timing nailed down at some point.

> [{quoted}](name=DemonRyu,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-30T10:16:56.497+0000)
>
> the most accurate timeline you will find , they update it consistently with what happens in the lore ^^ take a look http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Timeline   ( obviously some stuff here may not be accurate )
> 
> but i do agree Riot should make one themselves which would just be 100% accurate ! but this one is really good 
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

On that timeline on the wiki page there are some strange things....The void war destroying the underwater life....I am missing on something ¿ Or the fall of Shurima being more then 3000 years ago...

> [{quoted}](name=Camille Ferrøs,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-07-30T12:39:55.000+0000)
>
> On that timeline on the wiki page there are some strange things....The void war destroying the underwater life....I am missing on something ¿ Or the fall of Shurima being more then 3000 years ago...

Darkin Wars happen around 3000 years ago, around that time Zaun/Kha´zhun was "refound" as the north most Shuriman city. This was mentioned in Twilight of the Gods story, and the exact timeline dating was mentioned in a Riot official comment on social medias. That comment points out that Darkin War was around 3000 years ago, and that Ornn and others of his kind in Freljord were born around 8000 years ago (possibly even older).  

Again, you really need to sink into some pretty hidden official riot comments and direct discussions to get some of the timeline confirmations, dates, and character ages, otherwise the stories themselves dont fully explain the proper event chronology in its full desired state.

> [{quoted}](name=Tesla Effect,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-07-30T19:49:28.312+0000)

That comment points out that Darkin War was around 3000 years ago, and that Ornn and others of his kind in Freljord were born around 8000 years ago (possibly even older).  
> 
> Again, you really need to sink into some pretty hidden official riot comments and direct discussions to get some of the timeline confirmations, dates, and character ages, otherwise the stories themselves dont fully explain the proper event chronology in its full desired state.

Its more of a speculation then a timeline...Also Shurima fell around 1000 years ago...So the darkin wars were after that soo....

> [{quoted}](name=Camille Ferrøs,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-30T19:52:24.755+0000)
>
> Its more of a speculation then a timeline...Also Shurima fell around 1000 years ago...So the darkin wars were after that soo....

No you are incorrect with that, Shurima fell 3000 years ago. You bit of info is inconsistent with what we were given. If you are referencing Zoe being born 1000 years ago and that she was around when Darkin Wars happened , then thats also false as well since The Aspect of Twilight during Darkin Wars was a previous aspect host of that time. Zoe wouldnt be born for another 2000 years or so.

> [{quoted}](name=Tesla Effect,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-30T20:06:05.636+0000)
>

Zoe wouldnt be born for another 2000 years or so.

In the whole shuriman lore its said "millennia" which means 1000 years..
If it is not "for a millennia", which is a specific say, millennia may mean more than 1000 years.

> [{quoted}](name=Fasmodey,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=0003000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-30T20:58:07.184+0000)
>

Singular would be Millennium, Plural is Millennia.
Shurima fell around 3000 years ago. I don't want to give him as example for confirmation (since boards, twitter and reddit answers are not 100% canon), but that's what Scathlocke said.

We'll probably get one.
{{champion:26}} **_"ALL IN GOOD TIME"_**{{champion:26}}

I like to think "WHERES THE TIMELINE" is gonna be our new milestone now that we have our world map.
In all seriousness though, I do hope we get to a point where we can have a visual, some-what solidified timeline one day. We don't have specific dates, but a general idea of what happened when though.

Let's see. It took what, about 10-11 years for a solid map? That means it'll be at least another 10 before we get the accompanying timeline...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EuirjaFY,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-07-30T15:36:39.463+0000)
>
> Let's see. It took what, about 10-11 years for a solid map? That means it'll be at least another 10 before we get the accompanying timeline...
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

They were working on a timeline alongside the Map. Now that the large portion of the map is finished they can focus a lot of the effort into finishing up the timeline. Some Rioters have their one files where they store when each event happens in what order (to keep all the stories consistent with each other and without any plotholes).  The wiki timeline is a reflection of all current info we know from the lore as well as riot social media comments.
Good point Id like a timeline too:)
